title: Official F.E.K. 3.0 thread (OCE)
body:
OCE boards is semi-dead and there's no way to keep this thread at the top, so please go to the [NA thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/cg2zx6Ey-fek-30-preview) for information.

If you request an avatar on that page, it will also work on OCE boards.

replies.body:
wait i still have fek from the general disscussion days, is this a new update, do i need to download it again?

EDIT: i just posted this, and my fek icon isnt coming up, not even big icon. bug?
FEK 3 (for boards) is different from FEK 2 (for forums). It is not an update, but rather a separate script.
I will definitely check this out when I get the time to later. Looks very interesting.
When people quote reply, sometimes your avatar replaces theirs.

> When people quote reply, sometimes your avatar replaces theirs.

It's a bug that happens in Discussion View, which is overall much more buggy than Chronological View because I initially created FEK with Chronological View in mind.

Long live FEK.

Also reserving this post, just in case.

Soresu san change my avatar to this plz
http://i.imgur.com/afpEhY6.png
:D man Im getting good at drawing

Bump.

Edit: TFW when you can't bump on boards.

Bump!

My avatar reverted to an older one. D:
[Could I have this as my new one?](http://puu.sh/djmoZ/a8c2b35a9f.png)

> Bump!
> 
> My avatar reverted to an older one. D:
> [Could I have this as my new one?](http://puu.sh/djmoZ/a8c2b35a9f.png)

All fixed!
Rito bump icons are broken for me when a ritoer is OP.
Tundra Fizz, the main developer, is taking a break for a while due to a number of issues. There are a few bugs around, especially for Discussion Mode, but we can hopefully get by for now.

I'm unsure if I even really want to go down the path of FEK for boards, can't say I missed it...
It's not as necessary for myself since the 'avatars' are less noticeable without FEK - and I could probably do without the weaboo aspect.

But good on you guys for getting it running for Boards!
I'm sure this will please a lot of people!

> I'm unsure if I even really want to go down the path of FEK for boards, can't say I missed it...
> It's not as necessary for myself since the 'avatars' are less noticeable without FEK - and I could probably do without the weaboo aspect.
> 
> But good on you guys for getting it running for Boards!
> I'm sure this will please a lot of people!

FEK re-formats the post and gives you avatar size options from 100x100 to 200x200.

http://puu.sh/dcVJY.png
Thanks for getting this up and running man! (:
